Computes song duration of the project
controller - package controller
Inside this package you can find all API endpoints.

Adds Cross-Origin Resource Sharing headers to the responses

Counts all of the samples that belongs to the project.

Base class that stores credentials (e-mail and password), use also as JPA entity in connection with derived User class
